avoid_review_page.label: Avoid Review Page
avoid_review_page.tooltip: This option allow customer to avoid review page when all information is provided from PayPal website.

transfer_shipping_options.label: Transfer Shipping Options
transfer_shipping_options.tooltip: If this option is enabled, customer can change shipping address and shipping method on PayPal website. In live mode works via HTTPS protocol only.
transfer_shipping_options.comment: Notice that PayPal can handle up to 10 shipping options. That is why Magento will transfer only first 10 cheapest shipping options if there are more than 10 available.

require_billing_address.label: Require Customer's Billing Address
require_billing_address.comment: This feature needs be enabled first for the merchant account through PayPal technical support.

paypal_plus.label: PayPal Plus (Checkout Transparente)
paypal_plus.comment: Use a transparent solution and your customer no longer need to leave your store to make a payment.

module_title.label: Title PayPal Plus
module_title.tooltip: Será exibido no checkout: Cartão de Crédito (Texto do Complemento)

checkout_payment_info.label: Checkout (Review Método Pagamento)
checkout_payment_info.comment:
Além de elementos HTML, utilize os seguintes elementos para obter informações referente a transação:
{parcela_qtde}: retorna a quantidade de parcelas;
{parcela_valor}: retorna o valor da parcela.

installments.label: Habilitar esta solução
installments.tooltip: Caso tenha duvidas sobre como habilitar o parcelamento, entre em contato com o PayPal através do 0800 047 4482.
installments.comment: Para que essa opção funcione configure sua conta PayPal para aceitar parcelamentos.

installments_discount.label: Possui desconto à vista
installments_discount.comment: Desconto para pagamento à vista informado na conta PayPal do lojista.

installments_minimal.label: Parcela mínima
installments_minimal.comment: Valor mínimo aceito pelo PayPal é de R$5,00. Este valor pode ser alterado para quantias maiores.

paypal_custom.label: Nome de exibição
paypal_custom.title: Juros
paypal_custom.comment: Texto que será exibido ao cliente no checkout.

incontext.label: PayPal Express Checkout via Mini-Browser
incontext.comment: Use a in-Context solution only when Express Checkout is Active.

enable.label: Enable this Solution
enable.comment: Enable only if Express Checkout were configured.

merchantid.label: Merchant ID
merchantid.comment: This input has a MerchantId of Express Checkout Account.

login_ec.label: Express Checkout Login
login_ec.comment: Use the Express Checkout solution to facilitate user login and accelerate the purchase.

enable.label: Enable this Solution
enable.comment: Enable only if Express Checkout were configured.
enable.tooltip: For users who have itens on the shopping cart, it will be display a fast purchase button on the login and onboarding page where the user will be able to purchase with his PayPal account without the need to have an account on the store.

heading_Login.label: Warning! This solution will only work if the e-commerce accepts guest payments.

paypal_invoice.label: Invoice
paypal_invoice.comment: Use a Invoice solution to create accounts in a backend.
